description: Hack it. Hike it. Hardcore outdoor action is all in a Day’s work. Named for Dovetail Workwear co-founder, Kate Day, who worked the land growing up in Maine, owned a landscaping business, and never saw a shrub she didn’t want to prune. Relaxed fit through the leg. Packed with reinforcements, from a double-button waistband up top, to tough cuffs at the bottom. This pant has our lowest front rise at the waist, but is high-backed at the rear—because the only crack they like to see is dawn’s!<br><br>NOTE: Due to the nature of this canvas fabric, some women SIZE UP in this pant.
name: Day Construct Pants, Canvas, 30" Inseam - Womens
